import React,{useState}from'react';import logo from'./logo.svg';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({firstName:'',lastName:'',email:'',password:'',favoriteSeason:'Spring'});const[errors,setErrors]=useState({});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const errors={};// Regular expressions for validation
